author: luehe
msg: Separated out <fmt:bundle>'s config setting capabilities into new <fmt:setBundle> tag

author: luehe
msg: Removed Util.findAttribute(), which has been replaced by the new Config class

author: luehe
msg: Use <c:out> to output parse result so that time info is shown (this change has become necessary now that <fmt:parseDate> no longer outputs the parse result using toString()

author: luehe
msg: Undid change which had <fmt:parseDate> format the parsed result using the default pattern of the EN locale (public review comment suggested we use a standard, locale-independent format such as ISO 8601
